https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mBmknpTbp8ZiUbFQjbl8KaxZNFs.jpg The son of the inventor of a matter-transporter, which turned him into a monster when he tried to transport himself along with a tiny housefly, continues to pursue his father's experiment, while his own two sons attempt to extricate him, themselves and the family name from further disaster and scandal. Curse of the Fly
